ygData.subject: Re: Attempting to Power Smith this skill....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m level 26 but i ve done lots of research. Make scalers. At level 70 you will be able to make banded armor on occasion. At 90 is when I vebeen told it is
ygData.messageBody:
>What level should i make banded armor and studs at? I'm level 20 in smithing,
>what should i make?

I'm level 26 but i've done lots of research. Make scalers. At level 70 you will be able to make banded armor on occasion. At 90 is when I'vebeen told it is finally worthwile. At 125 it's easy.

>Also, i'm in kelethin and they only have medium molds for
>banded armor, where can i get small molds for banded armor?

Outside of the Gnome City of Ak'anon there are 4 houses. When facing the city on the right one of the 2 houses has small molds. On the left one has all the scaler and skewer mold and such.
